After the destruction of civilization is Bartertown, a city in the desert with primitive rules and fatalities that has a ruler (Tina Turner) who want to consolidate their power at any price. Until there comes Max (Mel Gibson) who is forced to join a fight, and for having refused to kill if your opponent has just been banned in the desert. Until a group of young wild and pass the saving to consider him a messiah that will lead to a new land.
